phrase: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
author: Ralph Marston

phrase: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
author: Zig Ziglar

phrase: Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings.
author: Salvador Dali

phrase: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
author: Epictetus

phrase: We may encounter many defeats but we must not be defeated.
author: May Angelou

phrase: Problems are not stop signs, they are guidelines.
author: Robert H. Schuller

phrase: Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
author: Dalai Lama

phrase: A creative man is motivated by the desire to achieve, not by the desire to beat others.
author: Ayn Rand

phrase: A somebody was once a nobody who wanted to and did.
author: John Burroughs

phrase: Life is 10% what happens to us and 90% how we react to it.
author: Dennis P. Kimbro

phrase: Even if you’re on the right track, you’ll get run over if you just sit there.
author: Will Rogers

phrase: Luck is a dividend of sweat. The more you sweat, the luckier you get.
author: Ray Kroc

phrase: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees all others.
author: Winston Churchill

phrase: The great thing in this world is not so much where you stand, as in what direction you are moving.
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

phrase: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending.
author: Carl Bard

phrase: Speak less than you know; have more than you show.
author: William Shakespeare

phrase: Education costs money. But then so does ignorance.
author: Sir Claus Moser

phrase: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

phrase: Do not let what you cannot do interfere with what you can do.
author: John Wooden

phrase: Defeat is not bitter unless you swallow it.
author: Joe Clark

phrase: An obstacle is often a stepping stone.
author: Prescott

phrase: Don’t worry about failures, worry about the chances you miss when you don’t even try.
author: Jack Canfield

phrase: Live each day as if your life had just begun.
author: Johann Wolfgang Von Goethe

phrase: The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
author: Mark Twain

phrase: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential, these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
author: Confucius
